name: Follow the Rules
description:
Follow the Rules is a small but simple game about how even simple things, with simple rules, can create enjoyable and fun games for friends. Working on the idea that you can create your own game just like this one with simple grid paper and coloured pencils, Lego bricks or even random objects from around a room.

There are a few rules to be set out when creating a game on imagination;

  • You can walk anywhere you want
  • Return to a checkpoint if you've broken any rules
  • Reach the goal
  • Each level can have their own rules, dont forget to check when you start!
  • Have fun!

Music for this game was Sourced from www.bensound.com
